paper_abstract: In this paper, an upper bound for a hybrid exponential sum over a finite field GF(p (m) ) is derived. This bound is then used to obtain an upper bound on the aperiodic correlation of nonbinary Kasami sequences in the small set. Similar method is also applied to get a new upper bound on the aperiodic correlation of binary Kasami sequences in the small set.
paper_title: Aperiodic correlation of Kasami sequences in the small set
